mealCard.SRdescr: Meal card for {{mealType}} summarizing all foods eaten for that meal

editFoodModal.title: Edit Food Entry
editFoodModal.description: Edit the form below to modify the food item in your meal plan.
editFoodModal.SRdescr: This will update the food item in your meal plan.

addFoodFormFields.name: Food Name
addFoodFormFields.srCalories: Enter the amount of calories in kcal for a 100 gram serving.
addFoodFormFields.srProteins: Enter the amount of proteins in grams for a 100 gram serving. Default is 0 grams.
addFoodFormFields.srCarbs: Enter the amount of carbohydrates in grams for a 100 gram serving. Default is 0 grams.
addFoodFormFields.srFats: Enter the amount of fats in grams for a 100 gram serving. Default is 0 grams.
addFoodFormFields.srSugars: Enter the amount of sugars in grams for a 100 gram serving. Default is 0 grams.
addFoodFormFields.srSaturatedFats: Enter the amount of saturated fats in grams for a 100 gram serving. Default is 0 grams.
addFoodFormFields.srGrams: Enter the amount in grams for this food item. Default is 100 grams.

foodDetailsModal.srDescription: Modal for food details like protein, carbs, fat, calories etc.

deleteFoodModal.title: Are you sure?
deleteFoodModal.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the food entry.

addFoodForm.title: Add Food to Meal Plan
addFoodForm.description: Fill out the form below to add a new food item to your meal plan.
addFoodForm.srDescription: Form to add a new food item to your meal plan
